entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Barrie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:31 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 10:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Temperature: -0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -3.6°C
Wind: S 26 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain mixed with freezing rain ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle changing to 40 percent chance of flurries or drizzle this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
